definitions: (of a person's thoughts or mind) briefly and suddenly recall a previous time or incident

examples.text: her thoughts immediately flashed back to last night

shortDefinitions: briefly and suddenly recall previous time or incident

definitions: (of a film, TV episode, etc.) show events that happened at an earlier time than the main story

examples.text: a special episode that flashed back to that fateful night almost a year before

shortDefinitions: (of film, etc.) show events earlier than main story
